name: LostDucks
description:
Frogger alternative. 

Use W,S,A,D & Space (jump). Alt + f4 to exit

Three ducklings must be delivered to the other side of this stream. You must get across using these logs which are moving down by the stream and for some reason upstream. There is only three minutes left before ducks lose their temper and gets lost. You don't want to be this monster who doesn't help young ducklings, so it is your time to rise up for the challenge and help out lost ducks.

KAMK2 - Trident2 - LAMK1
